tasks.name: Determine Content and Structure for index.html
tasks.objective: Identify the specific content and structure required for the index.html file.

inputs.user_preferences: User's input on desired content and structure
inputs.project_requirements: Any existing project guidelines or templates

outputs.content_structure: A defined outline of the content and structure for index.html

actions: Ask the user for specific content requirements
Provide a basic HTML template as a starting point
Confirm the preferred structure with the user
acceptance: User confirms the content and structure outline
risks: User may not provide clear content requirements
mitigations: Iterate on the content outline based on user feedback

tasks.name: Create index.html File
tasks.objective: Generate the index.html file in the specified directory with the agreed content and structure.

inputs.target_directory: The directory where the file will be created
inputs.content_structure: The defined outline of the content and structure for index.html

outputs.index.html: The created index.html file in the specified directory

actions: Create the index.html file in the target directory
Populate the file with the agreed content and structure
dependencies: Task-1: Determine Content and Structure for index.html
acceptance: File is created successfully in the specified directory
risks: File created in the wrong directory
Content does not meet user expectations
mitigations: Double-check the target directory before file creation
Review content with the user before finalizing

notes: Focus on user input to ensure the index.html file meets expectations and is created in the correct location.
